documentation.value:
```prisma
provider = "foo"
```
___
Describes which datasource connector to use. Can be one of the following datasource providers: `postgresql`, `mysql`, `sqlserver`, `sqlite`, `mongodb` or `cockroachdb`.

```prisma
relationMode = "foreignKeys" | "prisma"
```
___
Set the global relation mode for all relations. Values can be either "foreignKeys" (Default), or "prisma". [Learn more](https://pris.ly/d/relation-mode)
